s1.ptxt: Relieve fuel pressure according to Fuel Pressure Relief Procedure:For Petrol Engine Model .
Disconnect negative cable at battery.
Drain engine oil referring to Engine Oil and Filter Change (Petrol Engine Model) .
Drain transmission oil referring to Manual Transmission Oil Change:For Petrol Engine Model .
Drain A/T fluid referring to A/T Fluid Change .
Drain coolant referring to Cooling System Draining:For Petrol Engine Model .
Remove Air cleaner case referring to Air Cleaner Assembly Removal and Installation:For J20 Engine .
Remove water pump and generator drive belt referring to Water Pump and Generator Drive Belt Removal and Installation (For J20 Engine):For Petrol Engine Model .
Disconnect the following electric wires:

item.ptxt: Back up light switch (For M/T model) (12)
Magnet clutch switch of A/C compressor (if equipped) (15)
Input shaft speed sensor (For A/T model) (26)
Output shaft speed sensor (For A/T model) (27)

s1.ptxt: Disconnect the following hoses:

item.ptxt: Brake booster hose (21) from intake manifold
Radiator inlet and outlet hoses (22) from each pipe
Heater inlet and outlet hoses (23) from each pipe
Clutch oil pipe from transmission front case (For M/T model)
A/T fluid cooler hoses from radiator (For A/T model)

s1.ptxt: Disconnect A/T select cable from A/T (For A/T model).
For M/T model, remove shift control lever referring to Transmission Shift Control Lever Removal and Installation:For Petrol Engine Model .
Remove exhaust No.1, No.2 and center pipes referring to Exhaust System Components:For Petrol Engine Model .
Remove front and rear propeller shafts referring to Propeller Shaft Removal and Installation .
With hose connected, detach P/S pump from its bracket (if equipped) referring to P/S Pump Removal and Installation (J20A Engine Model) .

attention2.ptxt: Suspend removed P/S pump at a place where no damage will be caused during removal and installation of engine assembly.

s1.ptxt: With hose connected, detach A/C compressor from its bracket (if equipped) referring to Compressor Assembly Removal and Installation for J20 Engine Model .

attention2.ptxt: Suspend removed A/C compressor at a place where no damage will be caused during removal and installation of engine assembly.

s1.ptxt: Support front suspension frame and engine rear mounting member using jack (2).
Carry out Step 1) to 12) of “Removal” under Front Suspension Frame, Stabilizer Bar and/or Bushings Removal and Installation in order to lower engine with front suspension frame.
Remove front suspension frame mounting bolts (1).
Remove engine rear mounting member bolts (1).
Before lowering engine, recheck to make sure all hoses, electric wires and cables are disconnected from engine.
Lower engine with transmission, transfer, front suspension frame and engine rear mounting member from engine compartment.

attention2.ptxt: Before lowering engine, in order to avoid damage to A/C compressor and P/S pump, make clearance by rising them.

s1.ptxt: Disconnect transmission from engine referring to Manual Transmission Assembly Dismounting and Remounting:For Petrol Engine Model or Automatic Transmission Unit Components , if necessary.
Remove engine with engine front mounting bracket (1) from engine front mounting (2), if necessary.
Remove clutch cover and clutch disk referring to Clutch Cover, Clutch Disc and Flywheel Removal and Installation , if necessary.
Install clutch cover and clutch disk referring to Clutch Cover, Clutch Disc and Flywheel Removal and Installation , if removed.
Install engine with engine front mounting bracket to engine front mounting. For tightening torque, referring to Engine Mountings Components:For J20 Engine , if removed.
Connect transmission from engine referring to Manual Transmission Assembly Dismounting and Remounting:For Petrol Engine Model or Automatic Transmission Unit Components , if removed.
Lift engine with transmission, front suspension frame and engine rear mounting member into engine compartment with jack.

attention2.ptxt: Before lifting engine, to avoid damage to A/C compressor and P/S pump, make clearance by rising them.

s1.ptxt: Tighten engine rear mounting member bolt referring to Engine Mountings Components:For J20 Engine .
Carry out Step 5) to 19) of “Installation” under Front Suspension Frame, Stabilizer Bar and/or Bushings Removal and Installation in order to lift engine with front suspension frame.
Remove engine jack.
Install front and rear propeller shafts referring to Propeller Shaft Removal and Installation .
Install exhaust No.1, No.2 and center pipes referring to Exhaust System Components:For Petrol Engine Model .
Install A/C compressor to its bracket (if equipped) referring to Compressor Assembly Removal and Installation for J20 Engine Model .
Install P/S pump to its bracket referring to P/S Pump Removal and Installation (J20A Engine Model) .
Return disconnected hoses, cables and electric wire noting the followings.
Install water pump and generator drive belt referring to Water Pump and Generator Drive Belt Removal and Installation (For J20 Engine):For Petrol Engine Model .
Adjust water pump and generator drive belt tension referring to Water Pump and Generator Drive Belt On-Vehicle Inspection (For J20 Engine):For Petrol Engine Model .
Install air cleaner assembly referring to Air Cleaner Assembly Removal and Installation:For J20 Engine .
Check all removed parts are back in place.
For A/T model, adjust select cable referring to Select Cable Adjustment .
Refill cooling system with coolant referring to Cooling System Flush and Refill:For Petrol Engine Model .
Refill engine with engine oil referring to Engine Oil and Filter Change (Petrol Engine Model) .
Bleed air from clutch system referring to Air Bleeding of Clutch System for air bleeding procedure.
Install engine hood after disconnecting windshield washer hose.
Connect negative cable at battery.
With engine OFF, turn ignition switch to ON position and check for fuel leakage.
Start engine and check coolant, oil and exhaust gas leakage at each connection.
